Posts.Content: LyssBeth27 wrote: Hello Pink sisters. I just began left side radiation Monday. The location of my tumor was 8:30. I am having some palpitations. Has anyone had this happen with radiation? Dx 11/1/2017, IDC, Left, 2cm, Stage IB, Grade 2, 0/1 nodes, ER+/PR+, HER2- (IHC) Surgery 1/1/2018 Lumpectomy: Left; Lymph node removal: Sentinel Radiation Therapy 2/17/2018 Whole-breast: Breast Log in to post a reply
